summary: Implements the Moto response layer for the AWS DynamoDB Accelerator (DAX) service, parsing incoming requests, validating cluster identifiers, interacting with the inâ€‘memory DAX backend, and constructing JSON payloads for operations such as creating, describing, deleting, and configuring DAX clusters.
business_intent: Provides a mock implementation of the DAX API so developers can test and develop applications that use DAX without accessing real AWS resources.
